alright, here's my imperfect, not-imperfect list thing.

MAGES: imperfect
warp space is, um, awful.
too slow

ELVES: imperfect
not enough attack variety

CLERICS: perfect

THIEVES: imperfect
inviso cloak useless when your below level 7 or so
poison cloud keeps slimes from moving correctly?

SOLDIERS: imperfect
oh yeah, my attacks are so very cool and impressive!
whirlwind? what is this trash?

DRUIDS: imperfect
reveal? oh, what a useful skill!
fly! fly my faerie brethren!.. which is not a bad spell, but brings 
us to...

FAERIES: imperfect
what, um, do they do exactly?

im done for now. let you all know when i come up with more cynical 
comments
